description: Developed an AI resume parsing agent from 0 to 1, resulting in an estimated ARR of $6.5M. This was completed with support from the Kleiner Perkins Fellows Program.

Combined deep learning and extended Kalman filters for real-time IMU uncertainty estimation. Characterizing sensor noise, improving the precision and stability of sensor fusion algorithms on Google's consumer hardware.
Studied longitudinal, multimodal Apple Watch and iPhone data to discover novel artifacts in aggregated biosensor data and detect physiological events across demographic populations.
link_text: Key Apple Health and Fitness Metrics

description: Studied different geomorphological features on Mars to better understand Martian seasonal dynamics.
link_text: Pop Science Article on Mars Spiders
